holidays.title: Free Comic Book Day
holidays.description: Iconic publishers like DC Comics, and Marvel Comics join forces to make free comics available.

holidays.title: International No Diet Day
holidays.description: Put away your scales and form a new relationship with the person in the mirror today.

holidays.title: National Nurses Day
holidays.description: We celebrate Florence Nightingale and recognize the important role nurses play in our lives.

holidays.title: Beer Pong Day
holidays.description: Bottoms up! Beer Pong Day is here.

holidays.title: Childhood Stroke Awareness Day
holidays.description: Pediatric strokes are rare but they happen nonetheless. Learn more and take action now.

holidays.title: Dr. Mark A. Groh Cardiothoracic Surgeon Appreciation Day
holidays.description: If a cardiothoracic surgeon ever treated you, send them a thank you note today.

holidays.title: Herb Day
holidays.description: Let’s get those seeds ready, we’re going herb planting!

holidays.title: International Drone Day
holidays.description: On International Drone Day, learn about the evolution of drone use over time!

holidays.title: Join Hands Day
holidays.description: Work for the betterment of society by joining hands with the old and the new.

holidays.title: Joseph Brackett Day
holidays.description: Get ready for some amazing facts about Joseph Brackett and 'Simple Gifts.'

holidays.title: Kentucky Derby
holidays.description: The Kentucky Derby is also known as the ‘Most Exciting Two Minutes in Sports.’

holidays.title: Naked Gardening Day
holidays.description: Put away all your clothes and get your shovel ready for World Naked Gardening Day!

holidays.title: National Aidan Day
holidays.description: The Irish-derived name, Aidan, has gone through a journey around the world.

holidays.title: National Beverage Day
holidays.description: Whether you prefer a hot or a cold one, there is one for every taste.

holidays.title: National Bombshells’ Day
holidays.description: National Bombshells’ Day was created to highlight the importance of spreading self-love and love among women.

holidays.title: National Crepe Suzette Day
holidays.description: Let’s learn about crepes Suzette, how they are made, and what makes them so special.

holidays.title: National Explosive Ordnance Disposal Day
holidays.description: This day honors E.O.D. specialists, so let's delve deeper into its history and facts.

holidays.title: National Fitness Day
holidays.description: Make your move to stay fit on National Fitness Day.

holidays.title: National Herb Day
holidays.description: Wondering how National Herb Day came into being? We are here to shed some light.

holidays.title: National Scrapbook Day
holidays.description: Scrapbooks, at the end of the day, are much like visual diaries.

holidays.title: National Scrapbooking Day
holidays.description: Unleash your creative side and start scrapbooking with styles from minimalist to bold and bright.

holidays.title: National Start Seeing Monarchs Day
holidays.description: Get your binoculars ready and come see some monarch butterflies with us!

holidays.title: National Tony Day
holidays.description: Get together with all the Tonys and celebrate their special day today.

holidays.title: National Tourist Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Anyone who's done any traveling is likely guilty of being a tourist.

holidays.title: National Wildfire Community Preparedness Day
holidays.description: Get together on this day and take action to reduce the risks of wildfire.

holidays.title: Pilates Day
holidays.description: Pilates Day celebrates using this form of exercise to improve general health and quality of life.

holidays.title: Sauvignon Blanc Day
holidays.description: Get your wine glasses and bottles ready to make a toast as we celebrate this day!

holidays.title: World Ankylosing Spondylitis Day
holidays.description: More than three million people in the U.S. are living with Ankylosing Spondylitis.

holidays.title: Bob Seger’s Birthday
holidays.description: He refused to allow setbacks to dictate what he wanted to accomplish in life.

holidays.title: Chris Paul’s Birthday
holidays.description: Although he has never won the Championship, he has had a very productive career.

holidays.title: George Clooney’s Birthday
holidays.description: Join us in honoring George Clooney, a man with exceptional skills and good looks.

holidays.title: Meek Mill’s Birthday
holidays.description: This former battle rapper has become a successful artist leading nationwide reforms.

holidays.title: Willie Mays’s Birthday
holidays.description: This sports legend powered his team to a National League win and was named the M.V.P.
